name: Afterworld King
description:
The usual working day of the King of the Underworld, he is tired and wants only peace, but sinful souls never end, which means that the work of the King of the Dead will never end and he will not find peace.

AfterWorld King - Top Down View - A logic game where the player beats off the skulls of punishment and burns the souls of sinners, each completed task brings one step closer to victory.

Features of the game:
- Logic Walkthrough
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Complexity
